amendment.description: To nullify all across-the-board rescissions contained in this joint resolution.

vote.text: Amendment SA 36 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 52. Record Vote Number: 7.

action.text: Amendment SA 36 proposed by Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S1105-1113) To nullify all across-the-board rescissions contained in this joint resolution.
